name: Dashboarding Covid-19
headline: Graphing the Coronavirus with Python
description: Shortly after APIs became available, I looked to visualize that information into a web page that would keep me updated with how COVID-19 is affecting the United States.

name: #BLM on Twitter
headline: Understanding the Sentiment of #BLM on Twitter
description: At the height of protests around the country, I became curious of how different parts of the country were reacting. Using Tweepy and some simple NLP, I was able to do just that.

name: Github Activity
headline: Exploring the Github API to track all my projects
description: Wanting to explore the Github API, I decided to track my projects in a way that made more sense to me.

name: VSCode Extension
headline: Creating my own extension to improve workflow
description: During my time in SEMOSS, I became very skilled at writing Pixel (the domain specific language of the platform). Unfortunately, my scripts were text files, so I decided to add syntax coloring to better understand them.

name: Spotify Stats
headline: Using the Spotify API to track my top 10 artists and songs, and allowing others to do the same.
description: I am an avid music listener, and Spotify is my service of choice. The Spotify API is super well documented, so I decided to once again use my knowledge of python and flask to create a web application that allowed for easy viewing of these lists.
